department.ch: 網路學習科技研究所碩士班
department.en: Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology

goal.ch: 本課程從數位學習科技的應用範疇與角度，介紹質性研究方法，從研究典範、研究設計、資料收集技巧、資料分析、研究倫理、信效度的掌握、以及研究報告書寫等，帶領學生深入質量並重的研究概念。課程從方法論的議題開始討論，包括民族誌、傳記史、詮釋學、現象學、個案研究、行動研究、紮根理論等，至研究方法的操作，包括田野調查、深度訪談、焦點團體、參與觀察等，將理論與實務的結合，期望建立學生完整的質化研究概念，並提供學習者在進行數位學習科技的設計與實驗操作實，能有進行質性研究的行動依據。
goal.en: “This course is designed to introduce the research process, research methodologies, and research methods of qualitative research for digital learning. In research process section, there are brief introduction to research design, research ethics, validity and reliability, data collection, data analysis, and report writing. In research methodology, theoretical paradigms such as biography, case study, action research, phenomenology, ethnography, and grounded theory are taught. In research methods, students learn to conduct field study, participant observation, in-depth interviews, focus groups, questionnaires, and content analysis. The course continues the investigation of qualitative research concepts and techniques, focusing on the practice of field data collection, axial data analysis, and narrative report writing. The aim of this course is to allow each student to put theories into practice by taking a real case through the research process. Emphasis are on the in-depth discussion of theoretical issues, problems met in the course of action, and report writing quality improvement.“

outline.ch:
“本課程之教學目標在於：
（一） 比較質化與量化研究的差異
（二） 說明質化研究法之類型
（三） 探討質化研究進行的步驟與相關考量的因素
（四） 指導並演練質化研究資料蒐集的技巧
（五） 分析質化研究資料
（六） 書寫並報告質化研究結果“
outline.en:
“The instructional objectives of this course are:
1. Compare the differences between qualitative research methods from the quantitative methods.
2. Explain the qualitative research approaches
3. Investigate the qualitative research process and related factors
4. Instruct and practice qualitative research data collection skills
5. Analyze qualitative data through coding, sequence analysis, and content analysis
6. Practice narrative writing and reporting for qualitative research“

textbook.ch: 自製講義  [請尊重智慧財產權，不得非法影印教科書！]
textbook.en: Course Packet. [Respect intellectual property rights. Do not duplicate textbooks.]

講授
研討

個別指導
其他

gradMethod.ch: 課程參與：40％   課程習作：30％  期末報告：30％
gradMethod.en: Class Participation: 40％    Class Assignments: 30％     Final Report: 30％

ch.competencies: 認識數位學習之發展歷史與趨勢
培養數位學習之理論素養
培養數位學習所需之科技能力
培養數位學習研究方法與推廣應用之能力
培養創新設計與協調整合之能力
培養具國際觀之跨領域人才

en.competencies: Understand the developing history and trend of network learning.
Develop the theoretical accomplishment of network learning.
Develop the needed technological ability of network learning.
Develop the research methodology of network learning and the ability to  promote and put network learning in use.
Develop the ability to coordinate and make innovative design.
Develop multi-disciplined  talents with international perspective.

ch: 學制:限碩士班、博士班。學院:限文學院、資電學院。系所:限網路學習科技研究所碩士班、網路學習科技研究所博士班。
en: Type:Master's Program、Doctoral Program only.Faculty:College of Liberal Arts、College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.Department:Graduate Institute of Network Learning Technology、PhD in  Institute of Network Learning Technology only.
